text: Midway in Life (Persian: Nimeh rahe zendegi) is a 1953 Iranian film directed by Mehdi Besharatian.Issari p.273 == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. Cinema in Iran, 1900-1979. Scarecrow Press, 1989. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:Iranian films Category:Persian-language films Category:Films directed by Mehdi Besharatian
title: Midway in Life
